CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

1. BHJ polymer solar cells
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)
3. [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)
2. [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names. The other entities such as "recently," "higher than 7%," "power conversion efficiency," "several groups," and "developing of new polymer donor materials" do not refer to specific material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

1. "higher than 7%" - This is a property value representing the power conversion efficiency for BHJ polymer solar cells.
2. "7%" - This is also a property value representing the minimum power conversion efficiency for BHJ polymer solar cells mentioned in the text.
3. "1,4" - This is not a property value, but rather a reference to the first and fourth positions in a series or sequence.
4. "several groups" - This is not a property value, but rather a reference to multiple research groups.
5. "new polymer donor materials" - This is a type of entity, not a property value.
6. "[6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)" and "[6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" - These are chemical compounds used as electron acceptors in the polymer solar cells. While not explicitly stated as property values, they can be considered as values of the property "electron acceptor material" for the BHJ polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "higher than 7%" - Power conversion efficiency
2. "7%" - Minimum power conversion efficiency
3. "[6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)" and "[6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" - Power conversion efficiency values for specific electron acceptor materials in BHJ polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                          |
|--------------------------------------|
| higher than 7%                       |
| 7%                                  |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) - power conversion efficiency value |
| [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) - power conversion efficiency value |
